msg: make it easy to trim the members of string lists

msg: SOLR-737: use a constant score query for wildcards

author: sisbell
msg: A pom cannot inherit resources/testResources/pluginRepositories from a parent pom but it can from a super pom. Added this superPom inheritance.

author: jdcasey
msg: [MNG-3729] Fixing problems with project.executionProject being set to null after innermost forking mojo is finished, leaving it to cause a NPE when the next mojo uses it via reactorProjects. integration test will follow next.
